entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -42.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 04:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Temperature: -42.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 59 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
